verses.roman:
aiche caitanya-niṣṭhā yogya tomāte
tumi nā dekhāile ihā śikhiba ke-mate?

synonyms: aiche—such; caitanya-niṣṭhā—faith in Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; yogya—just befitting; tomāte—in you; tumi nā dekhāile—if you do not show; ihā—this; śikhiba—I shall learn; ke-mate—how.
translation: "This faith in Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu fits you quite well. Unless you demonstrate it, how could I learn such faith?
